# Counter App

A simple counter application built with React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and Vitest.

## Features

- Increment, decrement, and reset counter
- Styled with Tailwind CSS
- Persists counter value in localStorage
- Comprehensive test coverage with Vitest

## Getting Started

### Installation

```bash
npm install
```

### Development

```bash
npm run dev
```

### Build

```bash
npm run build
```

### Test

```bash
npm test
```

## Project Structure

.
├── index.html

├── vite.config.js

    │   ├── counter.test.js
    │   └── setup.js
    └── components

## Testing

The app includes comprehensive tests that verify:
- Counter renders correctly
- Buttons update the count
- Reset sets count to zero
- localStorage persists the value
